title: Some Folks' Lives Roll Easy
lyrics: Some folks' lives roll easy as a breezeDrifting through a summer nightHeading for a sunny dayBut most folks' lives, oh they stumbleLord they fallThrough no fault of their ownMost folks never catch their starsAnd here I am, lordI'm knocking at your place of businessI know I ain't got no business hereBut you said if I ever got so lowI was busted,You could be trustedSome folks' lives roll easySome folks' livesNever roll at allOh, they just fallThey just fallSome folks' lives
